nodes.text: This plant grew on the planet of Myrkr and had a long stalk covered with bluish-purple flowers. When touched, the plant caused allergic reactions in most humans, which came in the form of itch, puffiness and pustules. In 9 ABY Luke Skywalker, following the advice of Mara Jade, used this plant to disguise his appearance from Imperial patrols; after being treated with this plant, his face became puffy and unrecognizable.
